email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high 40s, say $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $50.25 per metric ton? Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the compromise. $50.25 per metric ton sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for October 15-20 and confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full charter party for review. Appreciate your help. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear we’re on the same page. I’ve locked in the laycan for October 15-20 and attached the charter party for your review. Demurrage remains at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if you need any further details. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the charter party. Everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the agreed terms: $50.25 per metric ton, laycan October 15-20, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Please confirm the booking, and we’ll issue the necessary instructions. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! The booking is confirmed for the MV Ocean Star under the agreed terms. I’ll send over the finalized charter party shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.
